entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is mentioned as being in his office, which is bathed in sunlight.

entities.name: godric gryffindor
entities.description: Godric Gryffindor's sword is mentioned as residing in a glass case in Dumbledore's office.

entities.name: fawkes
entities.description: Fawkes, the baby phoenix, is mentioned as making soft chirruping noises in his nest of ashes behind Harry.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as being present in Dumbledore's office and having thrown instruments to the floor.

entities.name: neville
entities.description: Neville is mentioned as being pulled up benches by Harry, and his robes are ripped.

relationships.description: Dumbledore and Harry have a conversation in Dumbledore's office about the prophecy.
Godric Gryffindor's sword is mentioned as residing in a glass case in Dumbledore's office, indicating that Dumbledore possesses the sword.
Fawkes, the baby phoenix, is mentioned as being in a nest of ashes behind Harry in Dumbledore's office, indicating that Dumbledore has possession of Fawkes.
Harry and Neville interact with each other as Harry pulls Neville up benches in the room where the archway was.
